name: admin.teams.admins.list
desc: List all of the admins on a given workspace.

cursor.desc: Set `cursor` to `next_cursor` returned by the previous call to list items in the next page.

limit.desc: The maximum number of items to return.

errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.invalid_auth: The given token is not authorized for the requested `team_id`.
errors.invalid_limit: Limit must be between 1 and 1000 inclusive.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and admins.
